 3/** @file    vsip/core/expr/operations.hpp

 6    @brief   VSIPL++ Library: Elementwise operations.

 8
 9#ifndef VSIP_CORE_EXPR_OPERATIONS_HPP
10#define VSIP_CORE_EXPR_OPERATIONS_HPP
11
12#include <vsip/core/promote.hpp>
13
14namespace vsip_csl
15{
16namespace expr
17{
18namespace op
19{
20
21template <typename Operand>
22struct Plus
23{
24  typedef Operand result_type;
25
26  static char const* name() { return "+"; }
27  static result_type apply(Operand op) { return op;}
28  result_type operator()(Operand op) const { return apply(op);}
29};
30
31template <typename Operand>
32struct Minus
33{
34  typedef Operand result_type;
35
36  static char const* name() { return "-"; }
37  static result_type apply(Operand op) { return -op;}
38  result_type operator()(Operand op) const { return apply(op);}
39};
40
41template <typename LType, typename RType>
42struct Add
43{
44  typedef typename vsip::Promotion<LType, RType>::type result_type;
45
46  static char const* name() { return "+"; }
47  static result_type apply(LType lhs, RType rhs) { return lhs + rhs;}
48  result_type operator()(LType lhs, RType rhs) const { return apply(lhs, rhs);}
49};
50
51template <typename LType, typename RType>
52struct Sub
53{
54  typedef typename vsip::Promotion<LType, RType>::type result_type;
55
56  static char const* name() { return "-"; }
57  static result_type apply(LType lhs, RType rhs) { return lhs - rhs;}
58  result_type operator()(LType lhs, RType rhs) const { return apply(lhs, rhs);}
59};
60
61template <typename LType, typename RType>
62struct Mult
63{
64  typedef typename vsip::Promotion<LType, RType>::type result_type;
65
66  static char const* name() { return "*"; }
67  static result_type apply(LType lhs, RType rhs) { return lhs * rhs;}
68  result_type operator()(LType lhs, RType rhs) const { return apply(lhs, rhs);}
69};
70
71template <typename LType, typename RType>
72struct Div
73{
74  typedef typename vsip::Promotion<LType, RType>::type result_type;
75
76  static char const* name() { return "/"; }
77  static result_type apply(LType lhs, RType rhs) { return lhs / rhs;}
78  result_type operator()(LType lhs, RType rhs) const { return apply(lhs, rhs);}
79};
80
81} // namespace vsip_csl::expr::op
82} // namespace vsip_csl::expr
83} // namespace vsip_csl
84
85#endif
